title: Amber Heard shows travel style in cream wide-leg pants to catch departing flight in New York City
text:
Amber Heard traveled in style Sunday as she she was spotted at JFK Airport in New York City.

The 33-year-old actress donned cream flared pants along with a thin white T-shirt and brown suede jacket to catch a departing flight.

She carried a black leather Yves Saint Laurent bag and accessorized with sunglasses, hoop earrings and necklace.

Travel style: Amber Heard arrived in style to catch a departing flight Sunday at JFK Airport in New York City

Amber had her blonde hair down and added a pop of color with bright red lipstick.

She completed her stylish ensemble with dark flat shoes.

Amber also was using headphones with one bud plugged into her left ear and the other dangling free.

The Aquaman star last month walked during Paris Fashion Week in the Le Defile L'Oreal Paris show.

Fall colors: The 33-year-old actress wore a brown jacket over a white T-shirt and wide-leg cream pants

Pop of color: The Aquaman star added a pop of color with red lipstick

Amber remains embroiled in a defamation lawsuit with her ex-husband, Johnny Depp, 56.

He sued Amber earlier this year for $50 million for defamation over an op-ed that she wrote in The Washington Post in December 2018.

They married in 2015 and Amber filed for a divorce in May 2016 that was finalized in January 2017.

Plugged: Amber was using headphones and had one bud plugged into her left ear

Legal matter: The Texas native remains embroiled in a defamation lawsuit with her ex-husband, Johnny Depp, 56, who sued her earlier this year for $50 million for defamation

Amber and Johnny met in 2011 while filming The Rum Diary together.

The Texas native can next be seen in the upcoming horror drama series The Stand based on the novel of the same name by Stephen King.

The Stand is expected to premiere on CBS All Access in 2020.
